as.description: You can use a custom element type for this component

autoFocus.description: When set to true, the Drawer is opened and is automatically focused on its own, accessible to screen readers

backdrop.description: When set to true, the Drawer will display the background when it is opened. Clicking on the background will close the Drawer. If you do not want to close the Drawer, set it to 'static'.

backdropClassName.description: Add an optional extra class name to .modal-backdrop It could end up looking like class="modal-backdrop foo-modal-backdrop in".

classPrefix.description: The prefix of the component CSS class

closeButton.description: Custom close button, set to false to hide close button

enforceFocus.description: When set to true, Drawer will prevent the focus from leaving when opened, making it easier for the secondary screen reader to access

onEnter.description: Callback fired before the Drawer transitions in

onEntered.description: Callback fired after the Drawer finishes transitioning in

onEntering.description: Callback fired as the Drawer begins to transition in

onExit.description: Callback fired right before the Drawer transitions out

onExited.description: Callback fired after the Drawer finishes transitioning out

onExiting.description: Callback fired as the Drawer begins to transition out

as.description: You can use a custom element type for this component

classPrefix.description: The prefix of the component CSS class

closeButton.description: When set to true, a close button will be displayed

onClose.description: Callback function when clicking the close button
